title: 2021 Rugby Europe Championship squads
text:
This is a list of the complete squads for the <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="2021%20Rugby%20Europe%20Championship">2021 Rugby Europe Championship</a> contested annually by the national rugby teams of <a href="Georgia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Georgia</a>, <a href="Netherlands%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Netherlands</a>, <a href="Portugal%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Portugal</a>, <a href="Romania%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Romania</a>, <a href="Russia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Russia</a> and <a href="Spain%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Spain</a>. Georgia are the defending champions.
Note: Number of caps and players' ages are indicated as of 6 March 2021 – the tournament's opening day (except for the Netherlands who played their first match in July). For players added to a squad during the tournament, their caps and age are indicated as of the date of their call-up.
Netherlands.
TBC.
Georgia.
On the 26th of February 2021, Maisahvili named a 32-man squad for the Rugby Europe Championship.
Head coach: <a href="Levan%20Maisashvili">Levan Maisashvili</a>
Portugal.
On the 1st of March 2021, Lagisquet named a 30-man squad for the Rugby Europe Championship.
Head Coach: <a href="Patrice%20Lagisquet">Patrice Lagisquet</a>
Call-ups.
On the 8th of March, <a href="Duarte%20Diniz">Duarte Diniz</a>, <a href="Anthony%20Alves">Anthony Alves</a>, <a href="Francisco%20Fernandes">Francisco Fernandes</a>, <a href="Duarte%20Torgal">Duarte Torgal</a> and <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Roque%20%28rugby%20union%29">José Roque</a> were called up to the squad, while <a href="Thibault%20Nardi">Thibault Nardi</a> returned to their club.
On the 19th of March, <a href="Lo%C3%AFc%20Bournonville">Loïc Bournonville</a> was called up to the squad, while <a href="Nuno%20Mascarenhas">Nuno Mascarenhas</a> and <a href="Luigi%20Dias">Luigi Dias</a> returned to their club.
On the 6th of July, <a href="Jo%C3%A3o%20Mateus">João Mateus</a>, <a href="Bruno%20Rocha">Bruno Rocha</a>, <a href="Jean%20Sousa">Jean Sousa</a>, <a href="Thibault%20de%20Freitas">Thibault de Freitas</a>, <a href="Boaventura%20Almeida">Boaventura Almeida</a>, <a href="Pedro%20Rosa">Pedro Rosa</a>, <a href="Pedro%20Lucas%20%28rugby%20union%29">Pedro Lucas</a>, <a href="Jo%C3%A3o%20Freudenthal">João Freudenthal</a> and <a href="Manuel%20Cardoso%20Pinto">Manuel Cardoso Pinto</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season, while <a href="Lo%C3%AFc%20Bournonville">Loïc Bournonville</a>, <a href="Geoffrey%20Mo%C3%AFse">Geoffrey Moïse</a>, <a href="Eric%20dos%20Santos">Eric dos Santos</a>, <a href="Frederico%20Couto">Frederico Couto</a>, <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Roque%20%28rugby%20union%29">José Roque</a>, <a href="Francisco%20Sousa%20%28rugby%20union%29">Francisco Sousa</a>, <a href="Vasco%20Ribeiro%20%28rugby%20union%29">Vasco Ribeiro</a>, <a href="Antonio%20Vidinha">Antonio Vidinha</a> and <a href="Sim%C3%A3o%20Bento">Simão Bento</a> were not re-called to the national team.
 
Romania.
On the 2nd of March 2021, Robinson named a 36-man squad for the Rugby Europe Championship.
Head Coach: <a href="Andy%20Robinson">Andy Robinson</a>
Call-ups.
On the 9th of March, <a href="Alexandru%20%C8%9Aigl%C4%83">Alexandru Țiglă</a> was called up to the squad, while <a href="Alexandru%20%C8%9A%C4%83ru%C8%99">Alexandru Țăruș</a> and <a href="Marius%20Antonescu">Marius Antonescu</a> temporarily returned to their club, yet <a href="Julien%20Bartoli">Julien Bartoli</a> permanently returned to their club.
On the 15th of March, <a href="Kamil%20Sobota">Kamil Sobota</a> was called up to the squad to replace <a href="Mihai%20Macovei">Mihai Macovei</a> who will temporarily return to their club while <a href="Ionel%20Badiu">Ionel Badiu</a>, <a href="Cristi%20Chiric%C4%83">Cristi Chirică</a> and <a href="Drago%C8%99%20Ser">Dragoș Ser</a> returned to their clubs due to injuries.
On the 22nd of March, <a href="Florian%20Ro%C8%99u">Florian Roșu</a> and <a href="Cosmin%20Iliu%C8%9B%C4%83">Cosmin Iliuță</a> were called up to the squad along with <a href="Cristi%20Chiric%C4%83">Cristi Chirică</a> who re-joined the squad while <a href="Alex%20Gorda%C8%99">Alex Gordaș</a>, <a href="Ionu%C8%9B%20Mure%C8%99an">Ionuț Mureșan</a>, <a href="Damian%20Str%C4%83til%C4%83">Damian Strătilă</a> and <a href="C%C4%83t%C4%83lin%20Fercu">Cătălin Fercu</a> returned to their clubs.
On the 18th of October, <a href="Florin%20B%C4%83rda%C8%99u">Florin Bărdașu</a>, <a href="Dorin%20Tic%C4%83">Dorin Tică</a>, <a href="Bogdan%20Doroftei">Bogdan Doroftei</a>, <a href="Andrei%20Toader%20%28rugby%20union%29">Andrei Toader</a>, <a href="Alexandru%20Alexe">Alexandru Alexe</a>, <a href="Moa%20Mua%20Maliepo">Moa Mua Maliepo</a>, <a href="Jason%20Tomane">Jason Tomane</a>, <a href="Hinckley%20Vaovasa">Hinckley Vaovasa</a>, <a href="Sioeli%20Lama">Sioeli Lama</a> and <a href="Marius%20Simionescu">Marius Simionescu</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season while <a href="Cristi%20Chiric%C4%83">Cristi Chirică</a> was re-called to the national team, whereas <a href="Eugen%20C%C4%83p%C4%83%C8%9B%C3%A2n%C4%83">Eugen Căpățână</a>, <a href="Johannes%20van%20Heerden">Johannes van Heerden</a>, <a href="Kamil%20Sobota">Kamil Sobota</a>, <a href="Alexandru%20%C8%9Aigl%C4%83">Alexandru Țiglă</a> and <a href="Stephen%20Shennan%20%28rugby%20union%29">Stephen Shennan</a> were not re-called to the national team.
On the 9th of November, <a href="Robert%20Neagu">Robert Neagu</a> was called up to the squad while <a href="Alex%20Gorda%C8%99">Alex Gordaș</a>, <a href="Dorin%20Tic%C4%83">Dorin Tică</a>, <a href="Bogdan%20Doroftei">Bogdan Doroftei</a>, <a href="Alexandru%20Alexe">Alexandru Alexe</a>, <a href="Vlad%20Neculau">Vlad Neculau</a>, <a href="Moa%20Mua%20Maliepo">Moa Mua Maliepo</a>, <a href="Vl%C4%83du%C8%9B%20Popa">Vlăduț Popa</a> and <a href="Sioeli%20Lama">Sioeli Lama</a> returned to their clubs.
Russia.
On the 17th of February 2021, Jones named a 32-man squad for the Rugby Europe Championship.
Head Coach: <a href="Lyn%20Jones">Lyn Jones</a>
Call-ups.
On the 14th of June, <a href="Shamil%20Davudov">Shamil Davudov</a>, <a href="Denis%20Mashkin%20%28rugby%20union%29">Denis Mashkin</a>, <a href="Nikita%20Bekov">Nikita Bekov</a>, <a href="Evgeny%20Elgin">Evgeny Elgin</a>, <a href="Vadim%20Zharkov">Vadim Zharkov</a>, <a href="Art%C3%A9my%20Gallo">Artémy Gallo</a>, <a href="Stepan%20Khokhlov">Stepan Khokhlov</a>, <a href="Maxime%20F%C3%A9ougier">Maxime Féougier</a>, <a href="Dmitry%20Gerasimov%20%28rugby%20union%29">Dmitry Gerasimov</a>, <a href="Denis%20Simplikevich">Denis Simplikevich</a> and <a href="Nikita%20Churashov">Nikita Churashov</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season, while <a href="Stanislav%20Sel%27skiy">Stanislav Sel'skiy</a>, <a href="Kirill%20Gotovtsev">Kirill Gotovtsev</a>, <a href="Stepan%20Seryakov">Stepan Seryakov</a>, <a href="Bogdan%20Fedotko">Bogdan Fedotko</a>, <a href="German%20Silenko">German Silenko</a>, <a href="Roman%20Khodin">Roman Khodin</a>, <a href="Alexandr%20Belosludtsev">Alexandr Belosludtsev</a>, <a href="Khetag%20Dzobelov">Khetag Dzobelov</a>, <a href="Daniil%20Potikhanov">Daniil Potikhanov</a> and <a href="Alexey%20Golov">Alexey Golov</a> were not re-called to the national team.
On the 6th of July, <a href="Viktor%20Kononov">Viktor Kononov</a> was called up to the squad while <a href="German%20Silenko">German Silenko</a> was re-called to the national team, whereas <a href="Andrei%20Ostrikov">Andrei Ostrikov</a>, <a href="Art%C3%A9my%20Gallo">Artémy Gallo</a> and <a href="Alexandr%20Budychenko">Alexandr Budychenko</a> returned to their clubs.
On the 20th of October, <a href="Anton%20Drozdov">Anton Drozdov</a>, <a href="Dmitry%20Parkhomenko">Dmitry Parkhomenko</a>, <a href="Alishan%20Umarov">Alishan Umarov</a>, <a href="Ivan%20Chepraga">Ivan Chepraga</a>, <a href="Dmitry%20Gritsenko">Dmitry Gritsenko</a>, <a href="Egor%20Zykov">Egor Zykov</a> <a href="Alexander%20Ivanov%20%28rugby%20union%29">Alexander Ivanov</a>, <a href="Pavel%20Kirillov">Pavel Kirillov</a>, <a href="Vitaly%20Klimov">Vitaly Klimov</a>, <a href="Vitaly%20Zhivatov">Vitaly Zhivatov</a>, <a href="Efim%20Ryabishchuk">Efim Ryabishchuk</a> and <a href="Gleb%20Farkov">Gleb Farkov</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season while <a href="Art%C3%A9my%20Gallo">Artémy Gallo</a> and <a href="Roman%20Khodin">Roman Khodin</a> were re-called to the national team, whereas <a href="Nikita%20Bekov">Nikita Bekov</a> and <a href="Maxime%20F%C3%A9ougier">Maxime Féougier</a> returned to their clubs, along with <a href="Shamil%20Magomedov">Shamil Magomedov</a>, <a href="Denis%20Mashkin%20%28rugby%20union%29">Denis Mashkin</a>, <a href="Stepan%20Seryakov">Stepan Seryakov</a>, <a href="Evgeny%20Elgin">Evgeny Elgin</a>, <a href="German%20Silenko">German Silenko</a>, <a href="Vadim%20Zharkov">Vadim Zharkov</a>, <a href="Victor%20Gresev">Victor Gresev</a>, <a href="Konstantin%20Uzunov">Konstantin Uzunov</a>, <a href="Ramil%20Gaisin">Ramil Gaisin</a>, <a href="Dmitry%20Gerasimov">Dmitry Gerasimov</a>, <a href="Andrei%20Karzanov">Andrei Karzanov</a>, <a href="Victor%20Kononov">Victor Kononov</a>, <a href="Denis%20Simplikevich">Denis Simplikevich</a> and <a href="Nikita%20Churashov">Nikita Churashov</a>, all of who returned to their clubs for the <a href="Rugby%20Europe%20Super%20Cup">Rugby Europe Super Cup</a> matches.
On the 1st of November, <a href="Kirill%20Gotovtsev">Kirill Gotovtsev</a>, <a href="German%20Silenko">German Silenko</a> <a href="Konstantin%20Uzunov">Konstantin Uzunov</a>, <a href="Ramil%20Gaisin">Ramil Gaisin</a>, <a href="Khetag%20Dzobelov">Khetag Dzobelov</a>, <a href="Andrei%20Karzanov">Andrei Karzanov</a>, <a href="Victor%20Kononov">Victor Kononov</a> and <a href="Daniil%20Potikhanov">Daniil Potikhanov</a> were re-called to the squad while <a href="Shamil%20Davudov">Shamil Davudov</a>, 
<a href="Efim%20Ryabishchuk">Efim Ryabishchuk</a> and <a href="Gleb%20Farkov">Gleb Farkov</a> returned to their clubs.
Spain.
On the 8th of March 2021, Santos named a 32-man squad for the Rugby Europe Championship.
Head Coach: <a href="Santiago%20Santos">Santiago Santos</a>
Call-ups.
On the 15th of March, <a href="Josh%20Peters">Josh Peters</a>, <a href="Gautier%20Gibbouin">Gautier Gibbouin</a>, <a href="Guillaume%20Rouet">Guillaume Rouet</a>, <a href="Manuel%20Ordas">Manuel Ordas</a>, <a href="Fabien%20Perrin">Fabien Perrin</a> and <a href="Richard%20Stewart%20%28rugby%20union%29">Richard Stewart</a> were called up to the squad, while <a href="Victor%20S%C3%A1nchez">Victor Sánchez</a>, <a href="David%20Barrera%20%28rugby%20union%29">David Barrera</a>, <a href="Pierre%20Barthere">Pierre Barthere</a>, <a href="Facundo%20Munilla">Facundo Munilla</a>, <a href="Daniel%20Barranco">Daniel Barranco</a> and <a href="Pablo%20Ortiz%20%28rugby%20union%29">Pablo Ortiz</a> returned to their clubs.
On the 22nd of March, <a href="Victor%20S%C3%A1nchez">Victor Sánchez</a> was re-called up to the squad while <a href="Andrea%20Rabago">Andrea Rabago</a> and <a href="Fr%C3%A9deric%20Quercy">Fréderic Quercy</a> returned to their clubs, the latter due to a match suspension.
On the 24th of June, <a href="Juan%20Pablo%20Guido">Juan Pablo Guido</a>, <a href="Afaese%20Tauli">Afaese Tauli</a>, <a href="Facundo%20Dom%C3%ADnguez">Facundo Domínguez</a>, <a href="Gabriel%20V%C3%A9lez">Gabriel Vélez</a>, <a href="Facundo%20Munilla">Facundo Munilla</a>, <a href="David%20Barrios">David Barrios</a>, <a href="Diego%20Periel">Diego Periel</a>, <a href="Julen%20Goia">Julen Goia</a> <a href="Sergio%20Molinero">Sergio Molinero</a>, <a href="J.%20W.%20Bell">J. W. Bell</a> and <a href="Guillermo%20Dom%C3%ADnguez">Guillermo Domínguez</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season while <a href="Fr%C3%A9deric%20Quercy">Fréderic Quercy</a>, <a href="Facundo%20Munilla">Facundo Munilla</a> and <a href="Pablo%20Ortiz%20%28rugby%20union%29">Pablo Ortiz</a> were re-called to the national team, whereas <a href="Kalokalo%20Gavidi">Kalokalo Gavidi</a>, <a href="Josh%20Peters">Josh Peters</a>, <a href="Brice%20Ferrer">Brice Ferrer</a>, <a href="Oier%20Goia">Oier Goia</a>, <a href="Gautier%20Gibouin">Gautier Gibouin</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Aurrekoetxea">Kerman Aurrekoetxea</a>, <a href="Guillaume%20Rouet">Guillaume Rouet</a>, <a href="Manuel%20Ordas">Manuel Ordas</a>, <a href="Alejandro%20Alonso%20%28rugby%20union%29">Alejandro Alonso</a>, <a href="Jordi%20Jorba">Jordi Jorba</a>, <a href="Brad%20Linklater">Brad Linklater</a> and <a href="Charly%20Mali%C3%A9">Charly Malié</a> were not re-called to the national team.
On the 12th of July, <a href="Kalokalo%20Gavidi">Kalokalo Gavidi</a>, <a href="Alejandro%20Alonso%20%28rugby%20union%29">Alejandro Alonso</a>, <a href="Daniel%20Barranco">Daniel Barranco</a> and <a href="Jordi%20Jorba">Jordi Jorba</a> were all re-called up to the squad while <a href="Gabriel%20V%C3%A9lez">Gabriel Vélez</a>, <a href="David%20Barrios">David Barrios</a>, <a href="Diego%20Periel">Diego Periel</a> and <a href="Julen%20Goia">Julen Goia</a> returned to their clubs.
On the 22nd of October, <a href="Pablo%20Miejimolle">Pablo Miejimolle</a>, <a href="Santiago%20Ovejero">Santiago Ovejero</a>, <a href="Bastien%20Dedieu">Bastien Dedieu</a>, <a href="Michael%20Hogg%20%28rugby%20union%29">Michael Hogg</a>, <a href="Luciano%20Molina">Luciano Molina</a>, <a href="Guillermo%20Moret%C3%B3n">Guillermo Moretón</a>, <a href="Javier%20Carri%C3%B3n">Javier Carrión</a>, <a href="Joan%20Losada">Joan Losada</a> and <a href="Gauthier%20Minguillon">Gauthier Minguillon</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season while <a href="David%20Barrera%20%28rugby%20union%29">David Barrera</a> and <a href="Brice%20Ferrer">Brice Ferrer</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Aurrekoetxea">Kerman Aurrekoetxea</a> and <a href="Julen%20Goia">Julen Goia</a> were re-called to the national team, whereas <a href="Marco%20Pinto%20Ferrer">Marco Pinto Ferrer</a>, <a href="Vicento%20del%20Hoyo">Vicento del Hoyo</a>, <a href="Andr%C3%A9s%20Alvarado">Andrés Alvarado</a>, <a href="Thierry%20Futeu">Thierry Futeu</a>, <a href="An%C3%ADbal%20Bon%C3%A1n">Aníbal Bonán</a>, <a href="Lucas%20Guillaume">Lucas Guillaume</a>, <a href="Matthew%20Foulds%20%28rugby%20union%29">Matthew Foulds</a>, <a href="Juan%20Pablo%20Guido">Juan Pablo Guido</a>, <a href="Fr%C3%A9deric%20Quercy">Fréderic Quercy</a>, <a href="Gonzalo%20Vinuesa">Gonzalo Vinuesa</a>, <a href="Alejandro%20Alonso%20%28rugby%20union%29">Alejandro Alonso</a>, <a href="Fabien%20Perrin">Fabien Perrin</a>, <a href="Sergio%20Molinero">Sergio Molinero</a> and <a href="Guillermo%20Dom%C3%ADnguez">Guillermo Domínguez</a> were not re-called to the national team.
On the 26th of October, <a href="Kawa%20Leauma">Kawa Leauma</a> and <a href="Jerry%20Davoibaravi">Jerry Davoibaravi</a> were called up to the squad while <a href="Tomas%20Munilla">Tomas Munilla</a> and <a href="Julen%20Goia">Julen Goia</a> returned to their clubs, the latter due to injury.
On the 2nd of November, <a href="Alberto%20Blanco%20%28rugby%20union%29">Alberto Blanco</a> was called up to the squad for the first time this season along with <a href="Andr%C3%A9s%20Alvarado">Andrés Alvarado</a>, <a href="Thierry%20Futeu">Thierry Futeu</a>, <a href="An%C3%ADbal%20Bon%C3%A1n">Aníbal Bonán</a> and <a href="Matthew%20Foulds%20%28rugby%20union%29">Matthew Foulds</a>, all of who were re-called to the squad while <a href="Bastien%20Dedieu">Bastien Dedieu</a>, <a href="Jon%20Zabala">Jon Zabala</a>, <a href="David%20Barrera%20%28rugby%20union%29">David Barrera</a> and <a href="Luciano%20Molina">Luciano Molina</a> returned to their clubs.
On the 9th of November, <a href="Marco%20Pinto%20Ferrer">Marco Pinto Ferrer</a>, <a href="Jon%20Zabala">Jon Zabala</a>, <a href="Lucas%20Guillaume">Lucas Guillaume</a>, <a href="Gautier%20Gibouin">Gautier Gibouin</a>, <a href="Tom%C3%A1s%20Munilla">Tomás Munilla</a>, <a href="Guillaume%20Rouet">Guillaume Rouet</a>, <a href="Manuel%20Ordas">Manuel Ordas</a> and <a href="Fabien%20Perrin">Fabien Perrin</a> were re-called to the squad while <a href="Alberto%20Blanco%20%28rugby%20union%29">Alberto Blanco</a>, <a href="Brice%20Ferrer">Brice Ferrer</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Aurrekoetxea">Kerman Aurrekoetxea</a>, <a href="Facundo%20Munilla">Facundo Munilla</a>, <a href="Javier%20Carri%C3%B3n">Javier Carrión</a>, <a href="Jerry%20Davoibaravi">Jerry Davoibaravi</a> and <a href="Pablo%20Ortiz%20%28rugby%20union">Pablo Ortiz</a> returned to their clubs.
On the 10th of December, <a href="Gavin%20van%20den%20Berg">Gavin van den Berg</a>, <a href="Joaqu%C3%ADn%20Dom%C3%ADnguez%20%28Spanish%20rugby%20union%20player%29">Joaquín Domínguez</a>, <a href="Joel%20Merkler">Joel Merkler</a> and <a href="%C3%81lex%20Suarez%20%28Spanish%20rugby%20union%29">Álex Suarez</a> were called up to the squad for the first time this season along with <a href="Facundo%20Munilla">Facundo Munilla</a>, <a href="Gonzalo%20Vinuesa">Gonzalo Vinuesa</a>, <a href="Julen%20Goia">Julen Goia</a> and <a href="Guillermo%20Dom%C3%ADnguez">Guillermo Domínguez</a>, all of who were re-called to the squad while <a href="Pablo%20Miejimolle">Pablo Miejimolle</a>, <a href="Andr%C3%A9s%20Alvarado">Andrés Alvarado</a>, <a href="Thierry%20Futeu">Thierry Futeu</a>, <a href="Jon%20Zabala">Jon Zabala</a>, <a href="An%C3%ADbal%20Bonan">Aníbal Bonan</a>, <a href="Victor%20S%C3%A1nchez">Victor Sánchez</a>, <a href="Matthew%20Foulds">Matthew Foulds</a>, <a href="Gautier%20Gibouin">Gautier Gibouin</a>, <a href="Guillermo%20Moret%C3%B3n">Guillermo Moretón</a>, <a href="Tom%C3%A1s%20Munilla">Tomás Munilla</a>, <a href="Manuel%20Ordas">Manuel Ordas</a> and <a href="Fabien%20Perrin">Fabien Perrin</a> were not re-called to the national team.
